RECYCLING-PROCESSES.DESCRIPTION: Add all the different battery chemistry types you process. Per battery type define which recycling site sare involved and provide some additional information regarding the recycling process.

LABELS.DESCRIPTION: Choose a description for this recycling step
LABELS.DESCRIPTION-DESCRIPTION: This is the identifier you typically use in your organisation for this recycling step. Take something that everyone in your organisation understands
LABELS.NAME: Choose a name for this recycling process
LABELS.PRECEDING-STEP: If any, choose a preceding step

RECYCLING-PROCESSES.PROCESS-DESCRIPTION: Add every recycling step that makes up your recycling process. Per recycling step you can define the recycling site and provide a process description.
